name: Beyblade Stadium
text: If you Fusion Summon a "Beyblade" monster; you can destroy 1 monster on the field with less ATK than that Fusion Summoned monster. You can only use this effect of "Beyblade Stadium" once per turn. Once per turn (Quick Effect): add 1 "Metal Fusion" or "Beyblade" card from your Deck or GY to your hand, then you can set it, and if it is a Spell, you can activate it this turn.
